title: Topic 005 Question 003
body: You have a connected Azure Stack Hub integrated system that uses Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS) as the identity provider.
You open a PowerShell session and store the GUID of an Azure subscription in a variable named $SubscriptionID.
You need to validate the AD FS integration.
How should you complete the PowerShell script? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
